articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri says players are close to striking in protest at an increase in fixtures.

articles.description: Can the Commonwealth Games adapt and survive, or will Glasgow prove to be the final staging post for an almost century-old institution?

articles.title: England v Australia: Saqib Mahmood added to squad for ODI series

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur manager Ange Postecoglou says his comment about always winning trophies in his second season was "not a boast".
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Spurs manager says "second-season trophy" remark not a "boast"

articles.description: Simon Easterby says it will be a "huge honour" to lead Ireland on an interim basis next year.
articles.title: Simon Easterby: Ireland assistant to lead side during Andy Farrell's Lions stint

articles.title: Emma Raducanu battles to first-round win over Peyton Stearns at Korea Open

articles.title: Birmingham City 3-1 Wrexham: Tom Brady, David Beckham and Ryan Reynolds on the phone

articles.description: The International Cricket Council (ICC) announces record prize money of more than £6m for next month's Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Record prize money for 2024 tournament
